name: project-context
description: Maintain project context across sessions with structured files. 5-file model (brief, architecture, state, progress, patterns) with brainstorm-first workflow: discuss → plan → implement → retro. Leverages native Claude Code features: Agent Teams for parallel execution, Plan Mode for research-first planning, and persistent Tasks for cross-session tracking. Includes smart routing, session continuity, quick mode, and adversarial challenge mode.
